title: TMC Movie-Talk #06 - The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
itunes:title: TMC Movie-Talk #06 - The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
description:
An anthology of six short films that take place in 19th-century post-Civil War era during the settling of the Old West. Starring Tim Blake Nelson, James Franco, Liam Neeson, Tom Waits, Zoe Kazan

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.
